content: B 12-30 12V Battery Compact and extra-light 12V Li-ion battery ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Batteries, chargers, and power stations- - - ### FEATURES:Features Our lightest 12V battery – built for control, dependability and comfort when working overhead or in hard-to-reach places Avoid interruptions to your work – accurate charge level display helps prevent unexpected loss of power, while overheating, overloading and deep discharge protection can cut unplanned downtime Ultra-durable casing – the rubberized, glass-fiber reinforced casing is up to four times more resistant to damage from dropping and twice as resistant to extreme temperatures than standard ABS plastic Applications Compact, extra-light 12V battery for use with Hilti cordless tools ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight: 0.53 lb. Dimensions (LxWxH): 3.6 x 2.8 x 1.6 in Working temperature range: 1 - 140 °F Technical Data | Weight | 0.53 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 3.6 x 2.8 x 1.6 in | Working temperature range | 1 - 140 °F ### ITEMS- 2333572 - Battery pack B 12-30 Li-ion - Package Size 1 pc
